behaviors.title: PolicyResolvedForChangeSet emitted before any GateLeaseIssued for same work_id
Maximum concurrent orchestrations bounded to MAX_CONCURRENT_ORCHESTRATIONS
Maximum gate types per orchestration bounded to MAX_GATE_TYPES (8)
Expired gate leases produce FAIL verdict (fail-closed timeouts)
Changeset digest in each lease matches authoritative ChangeSetPublished digest
Gate start entrypoint is start_for_changeset, not session-termination
Idempotency key is (work_id, changeset_digest) -- pure function of inputs
One-active-per-work_id: latest changeset supersedes old orchestration
Event payloads enforce MAX_PAYLOAD_BYTES (1 MiB) before deserialization
publisher_actor_id derived from verified actor_id column, not payload content
Policy hash from gate receipts verified against PolicyResolvedForChangeSet anchor
MergeReceipt atomically binds inputs to observed result (new commit SHA)
Gate receipt IDs sorted before inclusion in MergeReceipt for determinism
Merge conflicts produce ReviewBlockedRecorded events, not silent failure
Malformed-row resilience: parse errors advance cursor, not deadlock
SqliteTimeoutLedgerReader.poll_async delegates to poll_events_async via spawn_blocking (INV-CQ-OK-003)
GateTimeoutIntent uses #[serde(deny_unknown_fields)] to reject unexpected fields
parse_gate_lease_payload validates payload size and calls GateLease::validate() after deserialization
